description:
It`s a day of new beginnings at the College as Chise attends her first day of classes and meets some of her fellow students, and Elias adopts a mysterious guise for his first time teaching as a visiting instructor.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Birds of a Feather Flock Together. I
